casebody.data:
In the Matter of Ruth HAMILTON, Bankrupt; Samuel H. Draisin, Petitioner-Appellant. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. November 1, 1926.) No. 51. May & Jacobson, of .New York City, for petitioner and appellant. George O. Arkin, of New York City, opposed.

Before HOUGH, MANTON, and MACK, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Appeal dismissed, and, under petition to revise, order affirmed, with one bill of costs.
